features: Mr. Pen document file folder is a sleek and modern solution for organizing and storing important papers, designed in a calming light blue color that adds a touch of elegance to your office or study area.
Constructed with high-quality, sturdy materials, this file folder is built to protect your documents from wear and tear, ensuring they remain in pristine condition.
The folder features a flap closure that keeps documents secure and prevents them from slipping out while on the move.
Comes with a clear front sleeve that allows for easy viewing of contents, saving time when searching for specific documents.
Ideal for business professionals, students, and home organization, this file folder can hold various document sizes and is versatile for multiple uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel in love with the Design.
reviews.reviewText: Love the color, it is the light sagey green as shown in the photo, but last product I got was a soft pink color where the photo showed dark purple, So I was pleasantly surprized. The space is good and holds what I was looking for it to. The pocket on the back was a surprise but the rest of the story from this company is spot on fast accurate, good quality, company and values.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: I'll admit that I was initially drawn to this folder because of the color. It just looks so cute and bright in my travel bag and is easy to find quickly since it stands out. I used it on a trip to keep my documents and such organized and safe/flat and I am currently using it to store various mementos and photos in my craft cabinet. It holds a good amount while still maintaining its shape and it is easy to get things in and out. I love that you can see into the front so that you can grab things without having to sort through and find where they are. The magnetic closure is also nice, secure enough and much better than the folders with those winding string closures. I think this is a great value overall and I am very pleased with it so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for out of the office trips
reviews.reviewText: Its sleek design and durable plastic construction offer a professional look and long-lasting use. The magnetic closure provides secure storage while allowing for easy access to documents. With ample space and transparent sleeves for quick identification, this folder is perfect for both desktop and on-the-go use. Highly recommended for anyone looking to streamline their organization effortlessly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to organize!
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to come across and try this document organizer! It is larger and heavier duty that a regular file folder. But it’s not as big and bulky as an accordion folder. So pleased with this! Such a nice way to organize my important documents I need on hand. Well made, cute and good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for transporting documents
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice folder for transporting documents. I love the calming blue color. I like that the magnetic closure is strong enough that the folder won't open accidentally, and I also like that the pockets are clear. It does smell a little plasticky, but that will fade with time. My biggest gripe is that the smaller pockets are attached to the back part of the folder as opposed to the front, which is good because the material on the back is sturdier and less prone to the pockets tearing away from it, but bad because it's harder to locate the items in the smaller pockets. Despite the pocket situation, I still really like this and will definitely get use out of it. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great folder! It is well-made, sturdy, and holds quite a lot. I adore the flap magnet closure! I have already visited the Mr. Pen Amazon store and plan to purchase even more from them. I have a client who sent me a pic of the bible study, new bible tabs, and bible highlighters that she just got and I recognized the little mustache. I asked if it was Mr. Pen's products and she said yes!!! Haha...I sent her a pic of this folder and the highlighters I just got recently. So, needless to say, we are both pleased with our Mr. Pen purchases. These are giftable for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mr. Pen File Folder
reviews.reviewText: As someone who travels frequently for work, having a reliable document organizer is essential and this folder has exceeded my expectations.Firstly, the quality of the materials used is top-notch. The folder is made of durable and sturdy material, ensuring that my documents are well-protected during travel. The sleek and professional design also adds a touch of elegance to my office and school folders.The folder has multiple compartments and pockets, making it easy to organize and store different types of documents. I particularly appreciate the zippered pocket, which allows me to securely store smaller items such as business cards or USB drives. The folder also has a pen holder, which is a convenient feature for someone like me who is always on the go.One of the standout features of this folder is its compact size. It easily fits into my laptop bag or carry-on luggage, making it the perfect travel companion. I no longer have to worry about my documents getting crumpled or lost in my bag.In terms of functionality, the Mr. Pen File Folder has been a game-changer for me. It has made my work and school life much more organized and efficient. I no longer have to search through multiple folders to find a specific document, as everything is neatly stored in one place.Overall, I like the Mr. Pen File Folder to anyone in need of a reliable and functional document organizer. It is perfect for both office and school use, and its compact size makes it a great travel companion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item to keep papers secure
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice folder for carrying papers between work and home. It seems to be a nice, thick, quality plastic and will hopefully hold up for a while. I appreciate the magnetic closure to keep things in place while in my bag versus a manilla folder or regular folder where things can spill out or get bent. It's not super thick as far as capacity, so it wouldn't hold a huge amount, but it works for my need. I also like that it has a couple additional pockets inside to help keep smaller pieces of paper/sticky notes. The cute color is a nice bonus. Overall, a nice product and I would order from this company again.
